job.title: Software Engineer III
job.description: Software Developer III : 10 (internal purpose only) Centennial, Colorado : The Xpressfeed team is responsible for generating content feeds for the overall Data Management Solutions platform. Currently we have 12 agile teams working on Xpressfeed development and are looking to add 1 additional team to help scale out for the strong demand we are seeing from the business. We are working to scale out the development team to deliver new value to customers faster. Type of projects include backend database development, Tools to configure metadata driven system, Scaling into cloud environment, new delivery platforms, and expanding and scaling infrastructure. We are a global company and a global team with a history of delivering high value product feeds which drives over 500M in revenue for the S&P Global Market Intelligence division. You will get hands on experience developing, deploying, and support the products. Being small agile teams, you will see the results of your development and feel the success of the business as you successfully deliver on projects. In addition you will get to work with a highly knowable and energetic team working to solve complex business problems in a fast, highly productive environment. S&P Global states that the anticipated base salary range for this position is $55,900 - $155,900. Base salary ranges may vary by geographic location.  In addition to base compensation, this role is eligible for an annual incentive bonus/a sales commission plan.  This role is eligible to receive additional S&P Global benefits. For more information on the benefits we provide to our employees, visit https://www.spgbenefitessentials.com/newhires. At S&P Global Market Intelligence, we know that not all information is important—some of it is vital. Accurate, deep and insightful. We integrate financial and industry data, research and news into tools that help track performance, generate alpha, identify investment ideas, understand competitive and industry dynamics, perform valuation and assess credit risk. Investment professionals, government agencies, corporations and universities globally can gain the intelligence essential to making business and financial decisions with conviction.  S&P Global Market Intelligence is a division of S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI), which provides essential intelligence for individuals, companies, and governments to make decisions with confidence. For more information, visit www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence.
